title: WTB: T206 Cubs for my Cubs master set
author: npa589

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Cubs for my Cubs master set
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy any and every T206 Cub in every back except for the insane ones (Brown Lenox, BL460, Red Hindu, Uzit, Drum), though I'm sure I'll probably cave for at least one example of each at the end of the project. 

Since I'll be buying roughly 400+ cards (if I succeed), I'm looking for cards in the Poor/Auth-VG++ range. I don't care if they're trimmed, and all I prefer is that the fronts are presentable. I don't mind marks, miscuts, or small amounts of paper loss on the back. I would prefer them raw, as I'll be cracking them out anyways.

E-mail is best:

[url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url]

Progress thus far:

155/400




.

Nate

That's a really cool project.  Good luck on finishing it. 

Best
Scott
Thanks Scott, I'm going to try to get some pictures up before the weekend is finished.
Antsy to add some more before Christmas.

Nate,

That is awesome.  I will check my Cubs and see if I can add, but I doubt it.  Good luck with the pursuit.

Scot

Edited to add:  I have a couple you may need but I'm not sure PSA 4-5 is in your wheelhouse.  If it is let me know.
